title: Road to AMAA 2015! Ini Edo, OC Ukeje, Sadiq Daba, Demola Adedoyin & AY Makun Cover Vanguard Allure
content: Things are heating up for the 2015 Africa Movie Academy Awards! After gracing the cover of Exquisite Magazine’s latest issue (click here if you missed it), AMAA nominees Ini Edo, OC Ukeje, Sadiq Daba, Demola Adedoyin and host AY Makun are the cover stars of the latest issue of Vanguard Allure. The event which is […]...
